figures.imgAlt: Oracle Team USA's homepage for the America’s Cup.
figures.figcaption: Oracle Team USA's homepage using a pattern library that sped up building and branding for the seven other America's Cup teams.

figures.imgAlt: Team New Zealand's homepage for the America’s Cup.
figures.figcaption: Team New Zealand's brand applied to the pattern library, building out a fully developed team site.

figures.imgAlt: Team Artemis' homepage for the America’s Cup.
figures.figcaption: Sweden's Team Artemis also had its branding added to this pattern library.
